message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm initially offering it at $10,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? I'm confident this price reflects the true value you'll gain from the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $8,200 for it. Can you consider my offer?
